com.feilong.core.util

Class CollectionsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.util.CollectionsUtil

  • public final class CollectionsUtil
extends Object
    Collection 工具类,是 Collections 的扩展和补充.

    SET-MAP现代诗一首

    • 天下人都知道Set,Map不能重复
    • 80%人知道hashCode,equals是判断重复的法则 
    • 40%人知道Set添加重复元素时,旧元素不会被覆盖
    • 20%人知道Map添加重复键时,旧键不会被覆盖,而值会覆盖

    Collections Framework关系图:

    关于 Collection:

    1. 一组对象的集合,一般不直接使用
    2. 有 add,size ,clear, contains ,remove,removeAll,retainAll, toArray方法
    3. 没有get()方法.只能通过iterator()遍历元素

    关于 List:

    1. An ordered collection
    2. integer index for insert and search.
    3. 除了继承Collection接口方法外,有自己的方法定义: get(int) indexOf lastIndexOf listIterator set(int) subList(int,int)
    4. optional:可空,可重复

    关于 ArrayList:

    1. Resizable-array implementation of the List interface
    2. 元素可空
    3. 有自己控制容量(数组大小)的方法

    扩容:

    1. see ArrayList.ensureCapacity(int),
      在jdk1.6里面,int newCapacity = (oldCapacity * 3)/2 + 1 通常是1.5倍
      在jdk1.7+里面,代码进行了优化

    关于 LinkedList:

    1. Linked list implementation,双向链表
    2. 元素可空

    关于 Vector:

    1. growable array of objects
    2. 线程安全的动态数组 synchronized
    3. 操作基本和ArrayList相同

    关于 Stack:

    1. last-in-first-out (LIFO) stack of objects

    关于 Set:

    1. A collection contains no duplicate elements
    2. Set和Collection拥有一模一样的接口名称

    关于 HashSet:

    1. backed by a HashMap instance.
    2. makes no guarantees as to the iteration order of the set; 不保证顺序
    3. permits the null element.允许空元素

    关于 LinkedHashSet:

    1. Hash Map and linked list implementation of the Set interface,
    2. with predictable iteration order

    关于 TreeSet:

    1. A NavigableSet implementation based on a TreeMap.
    2. ordered using their natural ordering, or by a Comparator provided at set creation time

    关于 EnumSet:

    1. A specialized Set implementation for use with enum types.
    2. Null elements are not permitted.
    3. natural order (the order in which the enum constants are declared.
    4. abstract class.
    5. 以位向量的形式存储,这种存储形式非常紧凑,高效,占用内存很小,运行效率很好.

    关于 Queue:

    1. Queues typically, but do not necessarily,order elements in a FIFO (first-in-first-out) manner
    Since:
    1.0.2, jdk1.5
    Version:
    1.0.2 Sep 2, 2010 8:08:40 PM, 1.5.0 2016年1月8日 下午2:08:59
    Author:
    feilong
    See Also:
    Collections, ListUtils, IterableUtils, CollectionUtils

    • Method Detail

      • removeAll

        public static <O> List<O> removeAll(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                    Collection<O> remove)
        从 collection中 删除 所有的 remove. 返回剩余的集合 (原集合对象不变).

        The cardinality of an element e in the returned collection is the same as the cardinality of e in collection unless remove contains e, in which case the cardinality is zero.

        这个方法非常有用,如果你不想修改 collection的话,不能调用 collection.removeAll(remove);.

        底层实现是调用的 ListUtils.removeAll(Collection, Collection),将不是removeElement 的元素加入到新的list返回.

        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the collection from which items are removed (in the returned collection)
        remove - the items to be removed from the returned collection
        Returns:
        a List containing all the elements of c except any elements that also occur in remove.
        Since:
        Commons Collections 4, 1.0.8
        See Also:
        ListUtils.removeAll(Collection, Collection)

      • removeAll

        public static <O,V> List<O> removeAll(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                      String propertyName,
                                      Collection<V> values)
        从 collection中 删除 所有的 propertyName 值在 values集合中的对象. 返回剩余的集合 (原集合对象不变).

        这个方法非常有用,如果你不想修改 collection的话,不能调用 collection.removeAll(remove);.

        底层实现是调用的 ListUtils.removeAll(Collection, Collection),将不是removeElement 的元素加入到新的list返回.

        示例:

         List<User> objectCollection = new ArrayList<User>();
 objectCollection.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 objectCollection.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 objectCollection.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 
 List<String> list = new ArrayList<String>();
 list.add("张飞");
 list.add("刘备");
 
 List<User> removeAll = CollectionsUtil.removeAll(objectCollection, "name", list);
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(removeAll));
        返回: 
                [    {
            "age": 24,
            "name": "关羽"
        }]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        values - the values
        Returns:
        a List containing all the elements of c except any elements that also occur in remove.
        Since:
        Commons Collections 4, 1.5.0
        See Also:
        select(Collection, String, Collection), removeAll(Collection, Collection)

      • removeAll

        public static <O,V> List<O> removeAll(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                      String propertyName,
                                      V value)
        从 collection中 删除所有的 propertyName 值是 value的对象.返回剩余的集合 (原集合对象不变).

        该方法等同于 selectRejected(Collection, String, Object)

        这个方法非常有用,如果你不想修改 collection的话,不能调用 collection.removeAll(remove);.

        底层实现是调用的 ListUtils.removeAll(Collection, Collection),将不是removeElement的元素加入到新的list返回.

        示例:

         List<User> objectCollection = new ArrayList<User>();
 objectCollection.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 objectCollection.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 objectCollection.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 
 List<User> removeAll = CollectionsUtil.removeAll(objectCollection, "name", "刘备");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(removeAll));
        返回: 
         [{
            "age": 23,
            "name": "张飞"
        },{
            "age": 24,
            "name": "关羽"
        }]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        value - the value
        Returns:
        a List containing all the elements of c except any elements that also occur in remove.
        Since:
        Commons Collections 4, 1.5.0
        See Also:
        select(Collection, String, Collection), removeAll(Collection, Collection)

      • remove

        public static <O> List<O> remove(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                 O removeElement)
        从 collection中 删除removeElement,返回剩余的集合 (原集合对象不变).

        这个方法非常有用,如果你不想修改 collection的话,不能调用 collection.remove(removeElement);.

        底层实现是调用的 ListUtils.removeAll(Collection, Collection),将不是removeElement 的元素加入到新的list返回.

        示例:

         List<String> list = new ArrayList<String>();
 list.add("xinge");
 list.add("feilong1");
 list.add("feilong2");
 list.add("feilong2");
 
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(CollectionsUtil.remove(list, "feilong2")));
        返回: 
         ["xinge","feilong1"]
        此时,原来的list不变: 
         LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(list));
        输出 : 
         [
 "xinge",
 "feilong1",
 "feilong2",
 "feilong2"
 ]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the collection from which items are removed (in the returned collection)
        removeElement - the remove element
        Returns:
        a List containing all the elements of c except any elements that also occur in remove.
        Since:
        Commons Collections 4, 1.0.8
        See Also:
        ListUtils.removeAll(Collection, Collection)

      • removeDuplicate

        public static <O> List<O> removeDuplicate(Collection<O> objectCollection)
        去重.

        如果原 collection 是有序的,那么会保留原 collection元素顺序

        示例:

         List<String> list = new ArrayList<String>();
 list.add("feilong1");
 list.add("feilong2");
 list.add("feilong2");
 list.add("feilong3");
 
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(CollectionsUtil.removeDuplicate(list)));
        返回: 
             [
         "feilong1",
         "feilong2",
         "feilong3"
     ]

        效率问题？contains的本质就是遍历.

        在100W的list当中执行0.546秒,而contains,我则没耐心去等了.顺便贴一下在10W下2段代码的运行时间.
        [foo1] 100000 -> 50487 : 48610 ms.
        [foo2] 100000 -> 50487 : 47 ms.

        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the item src list
        Returns:
        如果传入的参数 objectCollection 是Null或者Empty,返回Collections.emptyList()
        else 先转换成 LinkedHashSet,再转换成ArrayList返回
        See Also:
        ArrayList.ArrayList(java.util.Collection), LinkedHashSet.LinkedHashSet(Collection), http://www.oschina.net/code/snippet_117714_2991?p=2#comments

      • getPropertyValueList

        public static <T,O> List<T> getPropertyValueList(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                                 String propertyName)
        解析对象集合,使用 PropertyUtil.getProperty(Object, String)取到对象指定的属性 propertyName的值,拼成List(ArrayList).

        示例:

         List<UserAddress> userAddresseList = new ArrayList<UserAddress>();
 UserAddress userAddress = new UserAddress();
 userAddress.setAddress("中南海");
 userAddresseList.add(userAddress);
 
 //*******************************************************
 Map<String, String> attrMap = new HashMap<String, String>();
 attrMap.put("蜀国", "赵子龙");
 attrMap.put("魏国", "张文远");
 attrMap.put("吴国", "甘兴霸");
 
 //*******************************************************
 UserInfo userInfo1 = new UserInfo();
 userInfo1.setAge(28);
 
 User user1 = new User(2L);
 user1.setLoves(new String[] { "sanguo1", "xiaoshuo1" });
 user1.setUserInfo(userInfo1);
 user1.setAttrMap(attrMap);
 user1.setUserAddresseList(userAddresseList);
 
 //*****************************************************
 UserInfo userInfo2 = new UserInfo();
 userInfo2.setAge(null);
 
 User user2 = new User(3L);
 user2.setLoves(new String[] { "sanguo2", "xiaoshuo2" });
 user2.setUserInfo(userInfo2);
 user2.setAttrMap(attrMap);
 user2.setUserAddresseList(userAddresseList);
 
 List<User> userList = new ArrayList<User>();
 userList.add(user1);
 userList.add(user2);

        以下情况:

        //数组 
         List<String> fieldValueList1 = CollectionsUtil.getPropertyValueList(userList, "loves[1]");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(fieldValueList1));
        返回 : 
         ["xiaoshuo1","xiaoshuo2"]
        //级联对象 
         List<Integer> fieldValueList2 = CollectionsUtil.getPropertyValueList(userList, "userInfo.age");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(fieldValueList2));
        返回 : 
         [28,null]
        //Map 
         List<Integer> attrList = CollectionsUtil.getPropertyValueList(userList, "attrMap(蜀国)");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(attrList));
        返回 : 
                ["赵子龙","赵子龙"]
        //集合 
         List<String> addressList = CollectionsUtil.getPropertyValueList(userList, "userAddresseList[0]");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(addressList));
        返回 : 
         [{"address": "中南海"},{"address": "中南海"}]
        Type Parameters:
        T - 返回集合类型 generic type
        O - 可迭代对象类型 generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - 任何可以迭代的对象
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        解析迭代集合,取到对象指定的属性 propertyName的值,拼成List(ArrayList),
        如果参数 objectCollection是null或者empty,会返回empty ArrayList
        如果参数 propertyName是null或者empty,将会出现异常;
        Since:
        jdk1.5
        See Also:
        BeanUtil.getProperty(Object, String), PropertyUtils.getProperty(Object, String), getPropertyValueCollection(Collection, String, Collection)

      • getPropertyValueSet

        public static <T,O> Set<T> getPropertyValueSet(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                               String propertyName)
        解析迭代集合,取到对象指定的属性 propertyName的值,拼成Set.

        注意:返回的是 LinkedHashSet,顺序是参数 objectCollection 元素的顺序

        示例:

         List<User> testList = new ArrayList<User>();
 testList.add(new User(2L));
 testList.add(new User(5L));
 testList.add(new User(5L));
 
 Set<Long> fieldValueCollection = CollectionsUtil.getPropertyValueSet(testList, "id");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(fieldValueCollection));
        返回: 
             [2,5]
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        解析迭代集合,取到对象指定的属性 propertyName的值,拼成Set(LinkedHashSet),
        如果参数 objectCollection是null或者empty,会返回empty LinkedHashSet
        如果参数 propertyName是null或者empty,将会出现异常;
        Since:
        1.0.8
        See Also:
        getPropertyValueCollection(Collection, String, Collection)

      • getPropertyValueMap

        public static <K,V,O> Map<K,V> getPropertyValueMap(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                                   String keyPropertyName,
                                                   String valuePropertyName)
        解析对象集合,以 keyPropertyName属性值为key, valuePropertyName属性值为值,组成map返回.

        注意:返回的是 LinkedHashMap,顺序是参数 objectCollection 元素的顺序

        示例:

         List<User> testList = new ArrayList<User>();
 testList.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 testList.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 testList.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 
 Map map = CollectionsUtil.getPropertyValueMap(testList, "name", "age");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(map));
        返回: 
         {
 "张飞": 23,
 "关羽": 24,
 "刘备": 25
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        O - 可迭代对象类型 generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - 任何可以迭代的对象
        keyPropertyName - the key property name
        valuePropertyName - the value property name
        Returns:
        解析对象集合,以 keyPropertyName属性值为key,valuePropertyName属性值为值,组成map返回
        如果 参数 objectCollection 是null or empty,return Collections.emptyMap()
        如果 参数 keyPropertyName 是null or empty,将会出现异常;
        如果 参数 valuePropertyName 是null or empty,将会出现异常;
        See Also:
        BeanUtil.getProperty(Object, String), PropertyUtils.getProperty(Object, String)

      • find

        public static <O,V> O find(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                           String propertyName,
                           V value)
        找到 objectCollection中,第一个 propertyName属性名称 值是 value对应的元素.

        如果 collection or predicate是null, 或者 collection中没有相关元素匹配 predicate,将返回null.

        示例:

         List<User> objectCollection = new ArrayList<User>();
 objectCollection.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 objectCollection.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 objectCollection.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 objectCollection.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(CollectionsUtil.find(objectCollection, "name", "关羽")));
        返回: 
         [{
 "age": 24,
 "name": "关羽"
 }]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        value - 指定的值
        Returns:
        the first element of the collection which matches the predicate or null if none could be found
        See Also:
        IterableUtils.find(Iterable, Predicate)

      • select

        public static <O,V> List<O> select(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                   String propertyName,
                                   V value)
        循环遍历 objectCollection,返回 当bean propertyName 属性值 equals 特定value 时候的list.

        示例:

         List<User> objectCollection = new ArrayList<User>();
 objectCollection.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 objectCollection.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 objectCollection.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 objectCollection.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(CollectionsUtil.select(objectCollection, "name", "关羽")));
        返回: 
             [{
             "age": 24,
             "name": "关羽"
         },{
             "age": 24,
             "name": "关羽"
         }]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object list
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        value - the value
        Returns:
        if Validator.isNullOrEmpty(objectCollection),return Collections.emptyList()
        See Also:
        CollectionUtils.select(Iterable, Predicate)

      • select

        @SafeVarargs
public static <O,V> List<O> select(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                                 String propertyName,
                                                 V... values)
        调用 ArrayContainsPredicate,获得 propertyName的值,判断是否 在values数组中;如果在,将该对象存入list中返回.

        具体参见 ArrayContainsPredicate的使用

        示例:

         List<User> objectCollection = new ArrayList<User>();
 objectCollection.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 objectCollection.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 objectCollection.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 
 String[] array = { "刘备", "关羽" };
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(CollectionsUtil.select(objectCollection, "name", array)));
        返回: 
               [{
               "age": 24,
               "name": "关羽"
           },{
               "age": 25,
               "name": "刘备"
       }]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        values - the values
        Returns:
        if Validator.isNullOrEmpty(objectCollection),return Collections.emptyList()
        See Also:
        ArrayContainsPredicate.ArrayContainsPredicate(String, Object...)

      • select

        public static <O,V> List<O> select(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                   String propertyName,
                                   Collection<V> values)
        调用 CollectionContainsPredicate,获得 propertyName的值,判断是否 在values集合中;如果在,将该对象存入list中返回.

        具体参见 CollectionContainsPredicate的使用

        示例:

         List<User> objectCollection = new ArrayList<User>();
 objectCollection.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 objectCollection.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 objectCollection.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 
 List<String> list = new ArrayList<String>();
 list.add("张飞");
 list.add("刘备");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(CollectionsUtil.select(objectCollection, "name", list)));

        返回 张飞 和 刘备的对象集合

        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        values - the values
        Returns:
        if Validator.isNullOrEmpty(objectCollection),return Collections.emptyList()
        Since:
        1.5.0
        See Also:
        CollectionContainsPredicate

      • select

        public static <O> List<O> select(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                 org.apache.commons.collections4.Predicate<O> predicate)
        按照指定的 Predicate,返回查询出来的集合.

        示例:

         List<Long> list = new ArrayList<Long>();
 list.add(1L);
 list.add(1L);
 list.add(2L);
 list.add(3L);
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(CollectionsUtil.select(list, new EqualPredicate(1L))));
        返回: 
             [1,1]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        predicate - 接口封装了对输入对象的判断,返回true或者false,可用的实现类有
        • EqualPredicate
        • IdentityPredicate
        • FalsePredicate
        • TruePredicate
        • ....
        Returns:
        if Validator.isNullOrEmpty(objectCollection),return Collections.emptyList()
        See Also:
        CollectionUtils.select(Iterable, Predicate)

      • selectRejected

        public static <O,V> List<O> selectRejected(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                           String propertyName,
                                           V value)
        循环遍历 objectCollection ,返回 当bean propertyName 属性值不 equals 特定value 时候的list.
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object list
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        value - the value
        Returns:
        if Validator.isNullOrEmpty(objectCollection),return Collections.emptyList()
        See Also:
        CollectionUtils.selectRejected(Iterable, Predicate)

      • selectRejected

        @SafeVarargs
public static <O,V> List<O> selectRejected(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                                         String propertyName,
                                                         V... values)
        循环遍历 objectCollection ,返回 当bean propertyName 属性值 都不在values 时候的list.

        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        values - the values
        Returns:
        if Validator.isNullOrEmpty(objectCollection),return Collections.emptyList()
        See Also:
        ArrayContainsPredicate, selectRejected(Collection, Predicate)

      • selectRejected

        public static <O,V> List<O> selectRejected(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                           String propertyName,
                                           Collection<V> values)
        调用 CollectionContainsPredicate,获得 propertyName的值,判断是否 不在values集合中;如果不在,将该对象存入list中返回.

        具体参见 CollectionContainsPredicate的使用

        示例:

         List<User> objectCollection = new ArrayList<User>();
 objectCollection.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 objectCollection.add(new User("关羽", 24));
 objectCollection.add(new User("刘备", 25));

 list.add("张飞");
 list.add("刘备");

        返回 关羽 的对象集合

        Type Parameters:

        V - the value type

      • group

        public static <T,O> Map<T,List<O>> group(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                         String propertyName)
        Group 对象(如果propertyName 存在相同的值,那么这些值,将会以list的形式 put到map中).

        返回的LinkedHashMap,key是 objectCollection中的元素对象中 propertyName的值,value是 objectCollection中的元素对象;
        顺序是 objectCollection propertyName的值 顺序

        示例:

         List<User> testList = new ArrayList<User>();
 testList.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 testList.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 testList.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 
 Map> map = CollectionsUtil.group(testList, "name");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(map));
        返回 : 
         {
 "张飞": [{
 "age": 23,
 "name": "张飞"
 }],
 "刘备": [{
 "age": 25,
 "name": "刘备"
 },{
 "age": 25,
 "name": "刘备"
 }]
 }
        Type Parameters:
        T - 注意,此处的T其实是 Object 类型, 需要区别对待,比如从excel中读取的类型是String,那么就不能简简单单的使用Integer来接收, 因为不能强制转换
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object list
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        if objectCollection isNullOrEmpty ,will return Collections.emptyMap();
        if propertyName isNullOrEmpty,will throw NullPointerException
        Since:
        1.0.8
        See Also:
        PropertyUtil.getProperty(Object, String), ArrayUtil.group(Object[], String), groupOne(Collection, String)

      • groupOne

        public static <T,O> Map<T,O> groupOne(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                      String propertyName)
        Group one(map只put第一个匹配的元素,后面出现相同的元素将会忽略).

        返回的LinkedHashMap,key是 objectCollection中的元素对象中 propertyName的值,value是 objectCollection中的元素对象;
        顺序是 objectCollection propertyName的值 顺序

        间接的可以做到基于某个属性值去重的效果

        示例:

         List<User> testList = new ArrayList<User>();
 testList.add(new User("张飞", 23));
 testList.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 testList.add(new User("刘备", 25));
 
 Map<String, User> map = CollectionsUtil.groupOne(testList, "name");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(map));
        返回 : 
         {
        "张飞":         {
            "age": 23,
            "name": "张飞"
        },
        "刘备":         {
            "age": 25,
            "name": "刘备"
        }
    }
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        if objectCollection isNullOrEmpty ,will return Collections.emptyMap();
        if propertyName isNullOrEmpty,will throw NullPointerException
        Since:
        1.0.8
        See Also:
        group(Collection, String)

      • groupCount

        public static <T,O> Map<T,Integer> groupCount(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                              String propertyName)
        循环 objectCollection,统计propertyName的值出现的次数.

        返回的LinkedHashMap,key是propertyName对应的值,value是该值出现的次数;
        顺序是 objectCollection propertyName的值的顺序

        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        if objectCollection isNullOrEmpty ,will return Collections.emptyMap();
        if propertyName isNullOrEmpty,will throw NullPointerException
        See Also:
        groupCount(Collection , Predicate, String)

      • groupCount

        public static <T,O> Map<T,Integer> groupCount(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                              org.apache.commons.collections4.Predicate<O> includePredicate,
                                              String propertyName)
        循环 objectCollection,只选择 符合 includePredicate的对象,统计 propertyName的值出现的次数.

        返回的LinkedHashMap,key是propertyName对应的值,value是该值出现的次数;
        顺序是 objectCollectionpropertyName的值的顺序

        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        includePredicate - 只选择 符合 includePredicate的对象,如果是null 则统计集合中全部的Object
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        if objectCollection isNullOrEmpty ,will return Collections.emptyMap();
        if propertyName isNullOrEmpty,will throw NullPointerException
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • avg

        public static <O> Map<String,Number> avg(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                         int scale,
                                         String... propertyNames)
        算术平均值.

        返回的 LinkedHashMap,key是 propertyNames的元素,value是基于这个属性名称获得的值的平均值;key的顺序是依照 propertyNames元素的顺序

        示例:

         List<User> list = new ArrayList<User>();
 
 User user1 = new User(2L);
 user1.setAge(18);
 list.add(user1);
 
 User user2 = new User(3L);
 user2.setAge(30);
 list.add(user2);
 
 Map<String, Number> map = CollectionsUtil.avg(list, 2, "id", "age");
 
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(map));
        返回: 
             {
         "id": 2.5,
         "age": 24
     }
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        scale - 平均数值的精度
        propertyNames - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        if Validator.isNullOrEmpty(objectCollection),return Collections.emptyMap()
        See Also:
        sum(Collection, String...)

      • avg

        public static <O> Number avg(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                             int scale,
                             String propertyName)
        算术平均值.

        示例:

         List<User> list = new ArrayList<User>();
 list.add(new User(2L));
 list.add(new User(5L));
 list.add(new User(5L));
        返回: 4.00
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        scale - 平均数值的精度
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        the map< string, list< o>>
        Since:
        1.5.0
        See Also:
        sum(Collection, String...)

      • sum

        public static <O> Map<String,Number> sum(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                                         String... propertyNames)
        总和,计算集合对象内指定的属性名值的总和.

        如果通过反射某个元素值是null,则使用默认值0代替,再进行累加

        示例:

         List<User> list = new ArrayList<User>();
 
 User user1 = new User(2L);
 user1.setAge(18);
 list.add(user1);
 
 User user2 = new User(3L);
 user2.setAge(30);
 list.add(user2);
 
 Map<String, Number> map = CollectionsUtil.sum(list, "id", "age");
 LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(map));
        返回: 
         {
 "id": 5,
 "age": 48
 }
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyNames - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        if Validator.isNullOrEmpty(objectCollection),return Collections.emptyMap()

      • sum

        public static <O> Number sum(Collection<O> objectCollection,
                             String propertyName)
        总和,计算集合对象内指定的属性名值的总和.

        如果通过反射某个元素值是null,则使用默认值0代替,再进行累加

        示例:

         List<User> list = new ArrayList<User>();
 list.add(new User(2L));
 list.add(new User(5L));
 list.add(new User(5L));
 
 Number number = CollectionsUtil.sum(list, "id");
 LOGGER.info("" + number);
        返回: 12

        说明:

        当你需要写这样的代码的时候, 
         
 protected Integer getCookieShoppingCartLinesQty(List<CookieShoppingCartLine> cartLineList){
     Integer qty = 0;
     //获取cookie中的购物车行集合
     if (null != cartLineList && cartLineList.size() > 0){
         for (Iterator iterator = cartLineList.iterator(); iterator.hasNext();){
             CookieShoppingCartLine cookieShoppingCartLine = (CookieShoppingCartLine) iterator.next();
             qty += cookieShoppingCartLine.getQuantity();
         }
     }
     return qty;
 }
        你可以写成: 
         
 protected Integer getCookieShoppingCartLinesQty(List<CookieShoppingCartLine> cartLineList){
     return Validator.isNullOrEmpty(cartLineList) ? 0 : CollectionsUtil.sum(cartLineList, "quantity").intValue();
 }
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        objectCollection - the object collection
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        如果 objectCollection is null or empty, 那么返回 null
        Since:
        1.5.0
        See Also:
        sum(Collection, String...)
